Fe.reference: Sherrell and Boyle, 1988; El Sayed, Aminot, and Kerouel, 1994; Sarthou and Jeandel, 2001

B.reference: Lee et al., 2009 for the Atlantic Ocean

Cl.reference: https://www.lenntech.com/composition-seawater.htm; Sherrell and Boyle, 1988; El Sayed, Aminot, and Kerouel, 1994 ; reduced from 24090 ppm

Na.reference: https://www.lenntech.com/composition-seawater.htm; Sherrell and Boyle, 1988; El Sayed, Aminot, and Kerouel, 1994 ; increased from 13410 ppm

S(6).reference: Longinelli and Craig, 1967 and Llyod, 1967 for the Red Sea

Ca.reference: Abdel-Aal et al., 2015; Culkin and Cox, 1966; Kumgalz, 1982

K.reference: Abdel-Aal et al., 2015; Culkin and Cox, 1966

Mg.reference: Abdel-Aal et al., 2015; Culkin and Cox, 1966

Sr.reference: Bernat, Church, and Allegre, 1972; Culkin and Cox, 1966

temperature.reference: Sherrell and Boyle, 1988; El Sayed, Aminot, and Kerouel, 1994
